an2.118-129:118.1.4: Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve āsā duppajahā”ti.
an2.118-129:119.1.3: Yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññū katavedī.
an2.118-129:119.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.118-129:120.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.118-129:121.1.3: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti.
an2.118-129:121.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā duttappayā”ti.
an2.118-129:122.1.3: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na vissajjeti.
an2.118-129:122.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā sutappayā”ti.
an2.118-129:123.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā rāgassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:124.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā dosassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:125.1.3: Parato ca ghoso ayoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.118-129:125.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā micchādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:126.1.3: Parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.118-129:126.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:127.1.3: Lahukā ca āpatti, garukā ca āpatti.
an2.118-129:128.1.3: Duṭṭhullā ca āpatti, aduṭṭhullā ca āpatti.
an2.118-129:129.1.3: Sāvasesā ca āpatti, anavasesā ca āpatti.
